amendment.description: Amendment sought to increase funding for the Child Survival and Health Programs Fund by $75 million with offsets from the Andean Counterdrug Initiative and military aid for Colombia.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 5 printed in the Congressional Record to reduce the Andean Counterdrug Initiative by $40 million and to reduce the amount for Foreign Military Financing Program by $35 million, and to transfer the resulting $75 million to the Child Survival and Health Programs Fund account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the McGovern amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 195 - 226 (Roll no. 426).
